routines.routine: //put any startup code or messages here
//put reset code here
if (dobj == player) { println("Not physically possible."); }
if (dobj.portable == 1) { if (dobj.holder != player) { println("(Taken)"); dobj.holder = player;} }
println("If you are experiencing suicidal thoughts you should seek psychiatric help.");
println("Perhaps you should count to 3 and calm down.");
println("***YOU HAVE DIED***."); reset();
println("Talking to yourself is a sign of impending mental collapse.");
println("That fails to produce an exciting conversation.");
println("You hear nothing unexpected.");
println("You smell nothing unexpected.");
println("Time passes...");
println("AAAAAAAAAAAAARRRRGGGGGG!");
println("WHEEEEEE!");
println("That's not part of a healthy diet.");
println("You can't drink that.");
println("[Note: you can't quit the test client]");
println("Taken.");
println("Dropped.");
println("Closed.");

events.event: if(conchita.location==player.location) println("You see Conchita in the room!") ;
if(luigi.location==player.location) println("You see Luigi in the room!") ;
if(jaws.location==player.location) println("You see Jaws in the room!") ;
if(joker.location==player.location) println("You see Joker in the room!") ;
if(dhalsim.location==player.location) println("You see Dhalsim in the room!") ;
if(sauron.location==player.location) println("You see Sauron in the room!") ;
if(thanos.location==player.location) println("You see Thanos in the room!") ;
if(t_800.location==player.location) println("You see T 800 in the room!") ;
if(van_damme.location==player.location) println("You see Van Damme in the room!") ;
if(chuck_norris.location==player.location) println("You see Chuck Norris in the room!") ;
if(chuck_norris.location==offscreen) println("You killed Chuck Norris!!! You WON!") ;

project.walkthrough: kill Conchita with ball attack,n,kill Luigi with pipe ,u,kill Jaws with dental floss ,u,Kill Joker with Full House Attack ,u,Kill Zangief with Chun Li Attack ,u,Kill Sauron With Ring Attack ,u,kill thanos with infinity attack ,u,kill t 800 with emp attack ,u,Kill Van Damme with Blind Attack ,u,kill Chuck Norris with God Attack
